title: Why wilderness?
creator_credit: David Corke, Shepparton South Technical School and Seymour High School
brief_description: Footage by students from Seymour High School and Shepparton South Technical School depicts the southwest of Tasmania. Commentary emphasises the importance for man to explore his surroundings and enjoy nature.
